text: Reality star Christopher'Big Black'Boykin passed away from suspected heart failure Tuesday. After news of his death, Shannon Turley - Big's ex - wife and mother of his nine - year - old daughter Isis - took to Twitter to express her grief Wednesday. Posting to the 45 - year - old reality persona's Twitter account, his ex - spouse said she was'heartbroken'and that Black was'everything to me and Isis and we will miss him.'' Heartbroken': After news broke of reality star Christopher'Big Black'Boykin's passing, his ex - wife Shannon Turley took to Twitter to share her grief.
